text:
e="preserve">Iceland sent people to compete at the 2018 Winter Paralympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea. Iceland sent one man to Pyeongchang. He competed in para-alpine skiing.
Team.
Iceland sent one man to Pyeongchang. He competed in para-alpine skiing.
The table below contains the list of members of people (called "Team Iceland") that will be participating in the 2018 Games.
